          <title>
            <string language="en">A burning candle and phlogiston theory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine brennende Kerze und eine phlogiston Theorie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une bougie et une théorie brûlantes de 
phlogiston</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma vela e uma teoria ardentes do phlogiston</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una candela e una teoria burning del phlogiston</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα καίγοντας κερί και phlogiston μια θεωρία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una vela y una teoría ardientes del phlogiston</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This series of illustrations shows a burning candle that eventually dies out when air inside the closed vessel becomes saturated with phlogiston.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">burning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">candle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">closed vessel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">combustion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flame</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phlogiston</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phlogiston theory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">saturation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wax</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Reihe Abbildungen zeigt eine brennende 
Kerze, die schließlich heraus stirbt, wenn Luft innerhalb des 
geschlossenen Behälters mit phlogiston gesättigt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette série d'illustrations montre une bougie 
brûlante qui s'éteint par la suite quand l'air à l'intérieur du 
navire fermé devient saturé avec le phlogiston.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta série das ilustrações mostra uma vela 
ardente que morra eventualmente para fora quando o ar dentro da 
embarcação closed se torna saturated com phlogiston.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa serie di illustrazioni mostra una candela 
burning che finalmente muore fuori quando l'aria all'interno del vaso 
chiuso è saturata con phlogiston.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η σειρά απεικονίσεων εμφανίζει καίγοντας κερί 
που πεθαίνει τελικά έξω όταν ο αέρας μέσα στο κλειστό σκάφος 
γίνεται διαποτισμένος με το phlogiston.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta serie de ilustraciones muestra una vela 
ardiente que muera eventual hacia fuera cuando el aire dentro del 
recipiente cerrado se satura con el phlogiston.</string>
          </description>
